Method Detail

registerSource

public void registerSource(T source)
                    throws JSSourceCreationException
Registers a source for this controller. The abstract IDnDController already takes care of registering the source to the main controller, and keeping the javascriptobject/source object mapping. It calls the createAndSetupJSSource method, which must be implemented

Parameters:
source - : a source to register.
Throws:
JSSourceCreationException

registerTarget

public void registerTarget(U target)
                    throws JSSourceCreationException
/** Registers a target for this controller. The abstract IDnDController already takes care of registering the target to the main controller, and keeping the javascriptobject/target object mapping. It calls the createAndSetupJSTarget method, which must be implemented

Parameters:
target - : a target to register.
Throws:
JSSourceCreationException

unRegisterSource

public void unRegisterSource(T source)
Unregisters a source. This template method takes care of destroying the JSSource and unregistering the source.

Parameters:
source - : the source to unregister

unRegisterTarget

public void unRegisterTarget(U target)
Unregisters a source. This template method takes care of destroying the JSSource and unregistering the source.

Parameters:
target - : the target to unregister

getGWTDnDElements

public java.util.Collection<IDnDElement> getGWTDnDElements(com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject source,
                                                           com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject jsDnDElements)
This method is used by the main controller to retrieve IDnDElement objects from a javascript array, containing the dojo javascript representations from the elements

Parameters:
source - : the source in which the elements should be gotten
jsDnDElements - : a javascript array containing the JS representations of the IDnDElements
Returns:

getDndElementAtGivenIndex

public abstract IDnDElement getDndElementAtGivenIndex(int index,
                                                      com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject source,
                                                      com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject nodesArray)
This method must be implemented by an actual controller to retrieve an IDnDElement from a JavaScript array.

Parameters:
index - : the index from wich the IDnDElement should be extracted
source - : the JSSource object
nodesArray - : the JSArray containing the dndElements

destroyAllSourcesAndTargets

public void destroyAllSourcesAndTargets()
This method is called by the DnDMainController when it receives a onWindowClosed event. It must ensure all JS sources and targets are properly destroyed.
